name: GEM_MINE
text: Mine tiles under it vertically. Harvest resources from the planet. Keep resources in its inventory. Stop mining when inventory is full.

name: GEM_CARRY
text: Carry resources strictly horizontally from point A to point B. Can pick items from other gems inventories except other CARRY. Can pick items from gems under it within its item range. Can drop items into the base storage when close to it on the surface.

name: GEM_TUNNEL
text: Mine tiles horizontally to its sides to create tunnels within its tunnel range. Do not have an inventory. Do not harvest resources. Stop when tunnel range is reached.

name: GEM_LIFT
text: Create a vertical lift. Locks the tile under it. Set a target above itself within item range or when reaching a ceiling or the surface. CARRY can drop items into the lift at its base and can pick items from the lift at its top.

name: GEM_FLOOR
text: Fill up tiles under it with floor. Continue vertically until it has reached a ceiling or the surface.

name: GEM_SHAFT
text: Mine tiles above it vertically within its shaft range. Do not have an inventory. Do not harvest resources. Stop when shaft range is reached.

name: MK1_MINE
text: Equip to a MINE to improve its stats. Can be unequipped.

name: MK1_TUNNEL
text: Equip to a TUNNEL to improve its stats. Can be unequipped.

name: MK1_CARRY
text: Equip to a CARRY to improve its stats. Can be unequipped.

name: FORGE_VULKAN
text: Build to forge hard ressources. Deploy itself on the surface close to the base. Merge resources into others on a cycle based on VULKAN SPEED stat.

name: FORGE_ORYON
text: Build to forge soft ressources. Deploy itself on the surface close to the base. Merge resources into others on a cycle based on ORYON SPEED stat.
